title: Textile, 1690–1710
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: damask weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vives y Escudero
description: Two side-by-side repeats of exotic foliage within a curving border in gold metallic brocade on a plum-colored ground. The repeats give the impression of a central vase or columnar form, but the design is not symmetrical.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1690–1710.
1690–1710. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: damask weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-414.
